meanings.sent1: She blaws out the candles on her birthday cake.
meanings.sent2: The wind blaws through the trees on a stormy night.
meanings.sent3: The little girl blaws bubbles with her bubble wand.
meanings.sent4: The strong wind blaws away the fallen leaves from the yard.
meanings.sent5: He blaws the dust off the old book before reading it.

meanings.definition: A sudden, strong gust of wind.
meanings.sent1: The blaws from the storm knocked over the trash cans.
meanings.sent2: We could hear the blaws howling outside our window.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected blaws messed up her carefully styled hair.
meanings.sent4: The blaws carried the kite high up into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The blaws felt refreshing on a hot summer day.
